title: T202 Hassan - Hal Chase - Action Center Panel Collection (4) SOLD
author: D. Bergin

posts.post_title: T202 Hassan - Hal Chase - Action Center Panel Collection (4) SOLD
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Lot of (4) Center Panels featuring the very popular Hal Chase

Includes:

#1. "Chase Safe at Third" - with Hal Chase and Frank Home Run Baker

#2. "Chase Ready for the Squeeze Play" - with Hal Chase at the plate

#3. "Hal Chase Too Late" - Chase playing first base with Ambrose McConnell sliding back into the bag

#4 "Chase Guarding First" - Hal Chase on the bag at 1st base

Condition as shown in the scans. If you need bigger scans, let me know and I'll e-mail them to you. 3 are pretty creased as shown. "Hal Chase Too Late" is the nicest looking and very clean.

SOLD for the set of (4) 

Pay almost any way you like. (Please, no pennies, crypto, POG's, or unused gambling slips)

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.
